channel.title: People can't connect To my server
channel.description:
Alright so i have this problem that im the onley one that can logg on to my own server.
The things that ive done ( so u guys can correct it )
Ive portforwarted it, im def. Sure its right i used the manual from my router..
Then i activated my No-ip duc, and prest the chek-box so the smily has a smile :)
Then i did "run" and opened my client. Tried to Register it on www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php
And it said: The server Magixscape is offline make shure its online before u register it :S Runelocust said the same.. help me out
thx

item.title: People can't connect To my server

item.description:
@g3t_0wn3d_n00bs wrote:

I have the same problem… I wish people would take 2 minutes of their time just to help us noobies out…
